{"id":1127797454,"question_id":3235,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1703471285,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1127797454/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Cost to Convert String I","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public long minimumCost(String source, String target, char[] original, char[] changed, int[] cost) {\n        long[][] graph = new long[26][26];\n        for(int i=0; i<26; i++){\n            Arrays.fill(graph[i], Integer.MAX_VALUE);\n            graph[i][i]=0;\n        }\n\n        for(int i=0; i<original.length; i++){\n            char src = original[i];\n            char tar = changed[i];\n            graph[src-'a'][tar-'a'] = cost[i];\n        }\n\n\n        for(int i=0; i<26; i++){\n            for(int j=0; j<26; j++){\n                for(int k=0; k<26; k++){\n                    graph[i][k] = Math.min(graph[i][k], graph[i][j]+graph[j][k]);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        long res = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<source.length(); i++){\n            if(source.charAt(i)==target.charAt(i)) continue;\n            \n            long val = graph[source.charAt(i)-'a'][target.charAt(i)-'a'];\n            if(val==Integer.MAX_VALUE) return -1;\n            res+=val;\n                    \n        }\n\n        return res;\n\n        \n    }\n\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-cost-to-convert-string-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
